name: Has Access of Customer Section
details: This will allow user to see the link of customers.

name: Can Update Customer
details: This will allow user to edit customers in the customer section.

name: Can Delete Customer
details: This will allow user to delete customers in the customer section.

name: Can Create Customer
details: This will allow user to create customers in the customer section.

name: Has Access of Channel Section
details: This will allow user to see the link of setting section.

name: Can Update Channel
details: This will allow user to edit channels in the customer section.

name: Can Delete Channel
details: This will allow user to delete channels in the customer section.

name: Can Create Channel
details: This will allow user to create channels in the customer section.
